content: I show you my stuff with DM Scotty hey crafters welcome DM Scotty here good to
have you with me today I'm going to show you a cool craft that is a neat plank

this type of bridge so let's go to the table and I'll show you what I'm talking
about alright for this project I'm just going
to start with a strip of cardboard and this is the thin type cardboard now what
I'm going to do is I'm going to take this punch and I'm going to I'm going to
break the corrugations on the cardboard so I'll start you can see them pretty
well on this side so you can see that the corrugation so I'm gonna go start on
the cardboard and just pull the ball there and just go next

we go guys here's the completed bridge and I think it's really cool it's this
is a quick and really easy method to simulate planking without actually

the corrugations of the cardboard and you end up
just paint it then I put the bridge now see you can see how it's flexible

checks you know go across you know if I start swinging or whatever is they go

and then they come up for under the bridge and start attacking and they have

big challenge to players and then you know if somebody falls off they have to
